dublin_core.dcvalue: Roland van de Ven, Technical Director, Elizabeth Glaser Pediatric AIDS Foundation/Tanzania, Email: roland@pedaids.org; Lucy Fulgence, Country Director Tanzania, D-Tree International, Email: lfulgence@d-tree.org
Tanzania, Tabora region, 25 sites in all districts (Igunga, Kaliua, Nzega Sikonge, Tabora municipal, Uyui and Urambo)

MobyApp is a mobile phone application which functions as a decision support tool for health workers, for linking mother and baby records and for tracking mother-baby pairs along the continuum of care across MNCH/HIV services.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:20Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 mobyapp.pdf: 187156 bytes, checksum: aeec6a4a52769cf905e76e4e3525b670 (MD5)
Client education and behavior change communication, Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Electronic health records, HIV/AIDS, Maternal health, Newborn health
